content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad we could meet. Let's focus on the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm interested in the newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. Could you tell me your starting price for the rent?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Let's start at 1500 Euro per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, that's a fair starting price. Could you consider lowering it a bit? I'm looking for the best deal possible.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I can consider lowering it, but I don't want to go below 1450 Euro per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. 1450 Euro is a good price. Would you be willing to meet in the middle at 1475 Euro? I think that's a fair compromise.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of 1475 Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Excellent! We have a deal at 1475 Euro per month. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
